snippet.title: Chrith: Ai no Tabidachi (クリス愛の旅立ち) for the NEC PC-6001 mkII
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

---


Game description:

You are playing as Jesus Christ (yes, really) and have to spread love to the people. You also have to avoid soldiers, snakes and other beings. There is also Satan who will sometimes appear and shoot fire at you, which you also should avoid. 

Sometimes God will throw down a power-up that will spread the love to every non-hostile being on the screen.

To win the game you have to spread the love to 50 people before the stage ends or you have lost all your lives.
